summaryDetails: Senior Software Engineer at Accenture specializing in Technology Architecture Solutions.  Have 7 years of experience in diversified fields of Web Application Development / Maintenance. During this career, I have involved in various phases of software development life cycle including Analysis, Design, Development and Testing.

profileHighlights.heighlight: Expert in web technologies -web standards, web 2.0, web analytics, web accessibility, web performance optimization, web security, rich Internet application, cross browser compatibility
Expert level experience in HTML, XHTML, CSS, JavaScript, JQuery, ExtJs, Ajax, JSON, Bootstrap and extensive experience in HTML5, CSS3.
Extensive experience in Object Oriented Programming.
Experience with photo editing tools and turning mockups into pixel-perfect HTML and creating well-organized CSS is a strong plus.
Experience in developing high traffic web sites like - www.disneycareers.com and disneyworld.disney.go.com/planning-guides/
Experience working with MEAN stack application.
Experience with procedural scripting languages like ANT, Maven, JavaScript, PHP, BASH.
